Text: The name on the folder was apparently to long for winrar, had to shorten it down to make it work. After that it Worked fine.

Tuxis - 

Thanks for posting the solution on opening these files. I renamed all of the files; and it worked! 
Just remember to keep the file numbers. For example, seconds.from.disaster.r00, seconds.from.disaster.r01, etc. 

Thanks
I have uploaded a true air disaster film at http://thepiratebay.org/tor/4179775/Crash_Landing__The_Rescue_of_Flight_232_(1992)[True_DC-10_crash]
